snippet: A man blew up his car in a parking lot in the fourth such attempted or successful bombing in Kandahar in less than a month.
abstract: Suicide bomber detonates his vehicle at a police parking lot in central Kandahar, Afghanistan, killing at least seven people, including five police officers and a child; attack comes just a day after the United Nations reports that more civilians died in 2011 than in any previous year of the war, mainly because of an increase in killings by insurgents.

byline.original: By TAIMOR SHAH and ALISSA J. RUBIN
byline.contributor: Taimor Shah reported from Kandahar, Afghanistan, and Alissa J. Rubin from Kabul. Enayatullah Najafizada contributed reporting from Mazar-e-Sharif.

lead_paragraph: A man blew up his car in a parking lot in the fourth such attempted or successful bombing in Kandahar in less than a month.

headline.seo: Afghan Suicide Attack Targets the Police in Kandahar
headline.main: Afghan Suicide Attack Targets Police in Kandahar
headline.print_headline: Afghan Suicide Attack Targets Police in Kandahar
